This isn't your typical stalker horror. It's something else. A freaky new teaser trailer has debuted for an indie horror thriller called Stalker made by French filmmaker David Cholewa. This 20 minute horror short has played a few small film festivals already but has not been released online yet. A young woman must confront her deepest fears if she hopes to survive the night. As she walks back home on a gloomy, threatening Paris night, she can't shake the feeling that she's being followed. As she gets closer to her residence, the presence becomes more and more bold and aggressive. And it is only by confronting her deepest inner fears that she can survive this ominous threat. This weird stalker looks like a giant spider which is scary as hell! Sandra Hohenadel stars as Sarah. Get a look at footage below and keep an eye out for this short dropping online. That shot of whatever is coming out of her mouth is gross. An effective, unsettling teaser for a horror short.

Here's the teaser trailers (+ posters) for David Cholewa's horror short Stalker, direct from YouTube:

Thanks to ScreenAnarchy for the tip on this. After a vicious assault at a party, a young woman flees the scene. And as she walks back home on a gloomy and threatening Paris night, she can't shake the feeling that she is being followed. As she gets closer to her residence, the presence becomes more and more bold and aggressive. And it is only by confronting her deepest inner fears that she will be able to survive the ominous threat. Stalker is directed by French filmmaker David Cholewa, also of the film Dead Shadows previously. The screenwriter is written by David Cholewa and Rémy Gente. Produced by Laurie Cholewa; co-produced by Rémy Gente. This short has premiered at a few small film festivals already in 2024. Stay tuned for updates on the release date and more info on how to watch. For more details visit the film's official site.
